author: Wayne Collins
description: A laid-back fruity, slightly sweet Mojito.
name: Bajan Mojito
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop flesh into glass
Add mint and gently MUDDLE (just to bruise mint)
Add rum, lime juice and crushed ice
CHURN (stir) drink in glass to mix
DRIZZLE passion fruit liqueur and serve with straws
